Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Lab \Lab\, v. i. [Cf. OD. labben to babble.] To prate; to gossip; to babble; to blab. [Obs.] --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
lab \lab\, n. 1. A telltale; a prater; a blabber. [Obs.] ``I am no lab.'' --Chaucer. [1913 Webster]
2. [By truncation of laboratory.] Laboratory. [Colloq.] [PJC]

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: lab \lab\, a. Of or pertaining to a laboratory; as, a lab bench. [Colloq.] [PJC]
lab n : a workplace for the conduct of scientific research [syn: {laboratory}, {research lab}, {research laboratory}, {science lab}, {science laboratory}]
